titles.title: IRS Oversight While Eliminating Spending (OWES) Act of 2016
IRS Oversight While Eliminating Spending (OWES) Act of 2016
IRS Oversight While Eliminating Spending (OWES) Act of 2016
To require that user fees collected by the Internal Revenue Service be deposited into the general fund of the Treasury.
IRS Oversight While Eliminating Spending (OWES) Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 24 - 14.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 114-498.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 380.

action.text: Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 687 Reported to House. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Resolution provides for the consideration of H.R. 1206 and H.R. 4885.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 687.

Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Resolution provides for the consideration of H.R. 1206 and H.R. 4885.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.R. 4885.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.R. 4885, the Chair put the question on passage and by voice vote announced that the yeas had prevailed. Mr. Blumenauer demanded the yeas and nays, and the Chair postponed further proceedings on passage of the bill until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 245 - 179 (Roll no. 161).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 435.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on April 18, 2016. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
IRS Oversight While Eliminating Spending (OWES) Act of 2016
(Sec. 2) This bill requires the Internal Revenue Service to deposit fees for services in the general fund of the Treasury and prohibits the expenditure of such fees unless an appropriations Act provides for such expenditure.
